inscription:
The passionate yearning of the warbler / brings forth / the song of the bamboo 
(Uguisu no / Renbo no take ni / Hatsune kana)
medium: Woodblock print (urushi-e); ink on paper, with hand-applied color and nikawa
signed: 方月堂正名はしら絵根元奥村文角政信正筆 {Hôgetsudô shômei hashira-e kongen Okumura Bunkaku Masanobu shôhitsu}
title: Wakashu in the Guise of Komusō
